#summary Check out what's new in D-Box 2.2

=What's new in D-Box 2.2=

  * *Support for themes*
  * D-Box now saves it's preferences in the system's "Application Data" folder
  * Fixed a nasty bug when your browsing your disk (issue 22)
  * D-Box now use the game's path as its default path instead of the last used (Issue 14)
  * More work on the "floppy flow"
  * Fixed several MacOS specific bugs:
    * No dataloss when you quit using Cmd(ï£¿)+Q
    * Possible to use the global menu's about and prefrences menuitems.
  * Possible to move the window by dragging in the toolbar.
  * Removed helptext in toolbar.
